data.name: Fantasy Grounds - Savage Worlds Necessary Evil Online Gaming (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
This online gaming product contains miniature tokens of unique villains and monsters you can encounter in this exciting setting for Savage Worlds! Not only does it have a whole heap of villains, but you'll also get the V'sori, their troops, and even four vehicle cutouts on the same scale as the other figures!

This product contains 150 tokens for use with Necessary Evil. There are multiple tokens for all tokens (close-ups and full figure), and addition tokens for creatures of varying sizes.

This token pack includes:

  • 2 Armor Forces
  • 2 Arrow heads
  • 2 Back Glides
  • 2 Ball Busters
  • 2 Black Holes
  • 2 Blast Fires
  • 2 Brain Bombs
  • 4 Brick Rages
  • 2 Captain Controls
  • 2 Carvinages
  • 2 Clock Stoppers
  • 2 Cobra Queen
  • 2 Cut-Lass
  • 2 Daemonis
  • 2 Desiras
  • 2 Doctor Sanguines
  • 2 Dragon Ladys
  • 2 Drones
  • 2 Emerald Scarabs
  • 2 Fiendish Fogs
  • 2 Gadgeteers
  • 4 G'roks
  • 2 Grrlilla
  • 2 Gun Runner
  • 2 Harajuku
  • 4 Hard Cases
  • 2 Hyper Drones
  • 2 Jack Slicks
  • 4 K'tharens
  • 2 Lady Teslas
  • 2 Madam Mercurys
  • 4 Memento Maori
  • 2 Metalia
  • 4 Noggins
  • 2 Ophiliea
  • 2 Pumpkin Flame
  • 6 Quislings
  • 4 Rages
  • 2 Scopes
  • 2 Screaming Blades
  • 2 Skull Caps
  • 4 SOCorps
  • 2 Sorcera
  • 2 Soviet Starts
  • 2 Speedys
  • 2 Spikes
  • 2 Spyrills
  • 2 Stretchpunks
  • 2 The Arkaynes
  • 2 The Sorcerers
  • 2 Trickshots
  • 2 Vendettas
  • 13 V'sori
  • 2 War Spheres
  • 2 Whiplashes
  • 2 Yellow Stars

Released on June 01, 2004. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 2.9.9 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

data.short_description: This online gaming product contains miniature tokens of unique villains and monsters you can encounter in this exciting setting for Savage Worlds! Not only does it have a whole heap of villains, but you'll also get the V'sori, their troops, and even four vehicle cutouts on the same scale as the other figures!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: a sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
